trans-unit.source: Abstract base class for materials.
trans-unit.target: 材質的抽象基底型別。

trans-unit.source: Materials provide texture to 3-D geometries.
trans-unit.target: 資料提供給 3-D 幾何的紋理。

trans-unit.source: Combined with a light source, a material makes a 3-D surface visible in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 結合光線的來源，資料會讓 3d 介面顯示場景中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)，用於使用針對 <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 實作而定義的預設格式。

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用來格式化值的提供者。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)，用於取得作業系統目前地區設定中的數值格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式，格式化目前執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 採用指定格式之目前執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the object based on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 根據目前的文化，建立物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: String representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性 (Culture) 特有的格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of the Material.
trans-unit.target: 建立材質的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: String representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的字串表示。
